title: 40p - Galle Rd at Major Intersection in Moratuwa
details:
This property faces the Galle Road at a major intersection in Moratuwa and has approximately 35 feet of road frontage. All offers welcome. Owners requesting market rate. Property will be sold to the highest offer. Priced to Sell Now at Rs. 3m per perch

Price - Rs. 3m per perch
